Pre-Game Insights: The Milwaukee Brewers face off against the St. Louis Cardinals on September 2, 2024, at 2:10 PM EDT.
The Brewers have dominated the season series, winning 7 out of 10 matchups so far.
In their last outing, the Cardinals showcased a powerful offense, defeating the New York Yankees 14-7, with Jordan Walker's impressive five-hit game leading the charge.
Milwaukee has been solid at home (40-25) and possesses one of the league's best records in games where they hit multiple home runs (30-8).
The Cardinals have struggled on the road, sitting with a 33-36 record, but their offense ranks fifth in the National League with 668 runs scored this season.
Expect a competitive matchup, especially with both teams looking to secure a crucial victory for their playoff hopes.
The pitching matchup features Andre Pallante (6-6, 3.80 ERA) for St. Louis against Freddy Peralta (9-7, 3.70 ERA) for Milwaukee, setting the stage for an intriguing contest.
